verbs.description: [ARG0: patriots] [V: looking] [ARG1: to acquire premium wide receiver] the new england patriots have already added a former no 1 wide receiver in that of josh gordon earlier this season after a slow start with the team gordon has performed well in recent weeks in fact he put up 11 receptions for 192 yards over the past three games all wins apparently that not enough for the patriots’ brass according to the athletic jay glazer new england is looking to add a premium receiver ahead of tuesday trade new york giants jay glazer josh gordon pierre garcon broncos patriots pierre garçon san francisco odell beckham jr new england patriots new england odell beckham jr denver broncos demaryius thomas cd broncos
